Chapter 6 Mendiani 6.1 Location Guinea 6.2 Ethnic group Malinke 6.3 Purpose Mendiani is an initiated dance for young girls between the ages of 8 and 12 who must be virgins. After Ramadan, they are carried out to the village bara on the shoulders of men, then they dance. 6.4 Notation 6.4.1 Sangban variations
